alert.note: Alert for Foster; Kidder; Sheridan; Stutsman; Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 3:26PM CST until January 08 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Kidder, Sheridan, Wells, Foster and Stutsman Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, until Noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow. Near blizzard conditions are possible at times in open country. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Life threatening wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.
